channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: WP2Hugo
item.description:
WP2Hugo

This is the best migrator for migrating WordPress export to Hugo. It handles several weird edge cases that I encountered while trying to migrate my personal website to Hugo-based site.

While this primarily targets Hugo-based code generation, one can use it to convert WordPress blogs to Markdown-based files that can be used with other systems for example Mkdocs or Jekyll.
item.content:encoded:
WP2Hugo

This is the best migrator for migrating WordPress export to Hugo. It handles several weird edge cases that I encountered while trying to migrate my personal website to Hugo-based site.

While this primarily targets Hugo-based code generation, one can use it to convert WordPress blogs to Markdown-based files that can be used with other systems for example Mkdocs or Jekyll.

Should I use this to migrate Deuts.NET to Hugo?

item.title: Power Apps Modern vs Classic Controls Reference
item.description:
Power Apps Modern vs Classic Controls Reference

A look at the different between Modern and Classic controls in Power Apps focused on Text Input, Number Input, Text Label, and Button controls.
item.content:encoded:
Power Apps Modern vs Classic Controls Reference

item.title: Jobspy API
item.description:
Jobspy API

Dockerized version of JobSpy, with API key auth, rate limiting, and proxy support.
item.content:encoded:
Jobspy API

Dockerized version of JobSpy, with API key auth, rate limiting, and proxy support.

item.title: SilverBullet Intro & Demo (v2 edition)
item.description:
SilverBullet Intro & Demo (v2 edition)

SilverBullet is an open source personal productivity platform built on Markdown, turbo charged with the scripting power of Lua.
Check out what’s the latest with Silverbullet. It comes with such power we could use in the future.
item.content:encoded:
SilverBullet Intro & Demo (v2 edition)

SilverBullet is an open source personal productivity platform built on Markdown, turbo charged with the scripting power of Lua.
Check out what’s the latest with Silverbullet. It comes with such power we could use in the future.

item.title: FileRise
item.description:
FileRise

Lightweight, self-hosted web-based file manager with multi-file upload, editing, and batch operations – built with PHP & JavaScript for seamless file and folder management (Docker & Unraid ready).
Another Filebrowser alternative.
item.content:encoded:
FileRise

Lightweight, self-hosted web-based file manager with multi-file upload, editing, and batch operations – built with PHP & JavaScript for seamless file and folder management (Docker & Unraid ready).
Another Filebrowser alternative.

item.title: Filegator
item.description:
Filegator

FileGator is a free, open-source, self-hosted web application for managing files and folders. You can manage files inside your local repository folder (on your server’s hard drive) or connect to other storage adapters.

FileGator has multi-user support so you can have admins and other users managing the files with different access permissions, roles and home folders. All basic file operations are supported: copy, move, rename, create, delete, zip, unzip, download, upload.
item.content:encoded:
Filegator

FileGator is a free, open-source, self-hosted web application for managing files and folders. You can manage files inside your local repository folder (on your server’s hard drive) or connect to other storage adapters.

FileGator has multi-user support so you can have admins and other users managing the files with different access permissions, roles and home folders. All basic file operations are supported: copy, move, rename, create, delete, zip, unzip, download, upload.

If allowed, users can download multiple files or folders at once. File upload supports drag&drop, progress bar, pause and resume. Upload is chunked so you should be able to upload large files regardless of your server’s configuration.

This could prove a worthy alternative to FileBrowser.

item.title: Wiki Go
item.description:
Wiki Go

A modern, feature-rich, databaseless flat-file wiki platform built with Go.
This wiki app looks promising. Pretty much looks like WikiDocs but better.
item.content:encoded:
Wiki Go

A modern, feature-rich, databaseless flat-file wiki platform built with Go.
This wiki app looks promising. Pretty much looks like WikiDocs but better.

item.title: HugoNest - Hugo Mobile iOS & Android APP with AI and Git Integration
item.description:
HugoNest - Hugo Mobile iOS & Android APP with AI and Git Integration

Efficiently manage your Hugo static site anytime, anywhere. HugoNest offers seamless mobile Markdown editing, reliable AI Powered Git integration, and offline support—the ideal mobile companion for Hugo developers and content creators.
item.content:encoded:
HugoNest - Hugo Mobile iOS & Android APP with AI and Git Integration

Efficiently manage your Hugo static site anytime, anywhere. HugoNest offers seamless mobile Markdown editing, reliable AI Powered Git integration, and offline support—the ideal mobile companion for Hugo developers and content creators.

item.title: Docker Stats
item.description:
Docker Stats

A web app to monitor usage of your Docker containers. Includes advanced filters, charts and notifications support (browser and pushover).
At its current state, I’m not sure if this can be reliable. Docker install is not yet available. Saving this for future reference.
item.content:encoded:
Docker Stats

A web app to monitor usage of your Docker containers. Includes advanced filters, charts and notifications support (browser and pushover).
At its current state, I’m not sure if this can be reliable. Docker install is not yet available. Saving this for future reference.

item.title: KeepAlive - alternative to Wake On Lan
item.description:
KeepAlive - alternative to Wake On Lan

Restart a Linux server made of a potato laptop after power outages
This might be useful for some of my old machines lying around.
item.content:encoded:
KeepAlive - alternative to Wake On Lan

Restart a Linux server made of a potato laptop after power outages
This might be useful for some of my old machines lying around.
